title: Revenue Management for Hotels
description: Optimize hotel revenue management with RoomPriceGenie. Increase revenue up to 22% effortlessly while saving hours of work with automated rate adjustments.
content: ## The smartestrevenue management software Maximize your revenue withhotel revenue managementsoftware. Make 19%+ more income, while saving hours of work. ## The smartestrevenue management software Maximize your revenue withhotel revenue managementsoftware. Make 19%+ more income, while saving hours of work. ## Automatewhat you now do manually RoomPriceGenie gives you price recommendations that you understand and can control. ## Hotelrevenue management softwarebuilt to maximize every night Running an independent hotel means every room counts, every hour matters, and every rate needs to work harder. RoomPriceGenie is designed to make that easier for you with real-time automation, clear pricing insights, and total control, even when using autopilot. Here’s how it works: Your rates stay sharp around the clock. Our hotel revenue management software constantly monitors market demand, competitor pricing, and your own booking pace, adjusting your prices up to 24 times a day so you’re always in the sweet spot. Get a bird’s-eye view of your pricing for the weeks ahead. The calendar makes it easy to understand how your rates are set and lets you tweak anything with just a click. It’s clear, flexible, and made for busy hoteliers. Your revenue story at a glance. Track performance, spot trends, and get the confidence to make smarter pricing decisions. No spreadsheets, no digging: just clean, digestible data you can actually use. Let RoomPriceGenie run your pricing for you, so you can stay focused on running your hotel. You stay in control, but the day-to-day decisions are handled behind the scenes based on your rules and real-time demand. If bookings start flooding in for a certain date, our hotel revenue management system catches the spike and adjusts your prices immediately. That means you never sell out too early or too cheap, so you get the most out of every opportunity. Set minimum stays that flex with demand. Boost longer bookings during busy periods and keep your occupancy balanced year-round, without manually adjusting rules every other day. Managing more than one hotel?RoomPriceGenie scales with ease.See how we support hotel groups with smart pricing across every property. ## Run a successful business throughautomated room pricing Running an independent hotel means every decision impacts your bottom line. Pricing isn’t just about numbers; it’s about strategy. It’s knowing when demand is rising, how competitors are behaving, and how to make the most of every night. RoomPriceGenie’srecent study of 567 hotelsrevealed that properties using our revenue management system experienced an average revenue increase of 19%. ## More revenue, more confidence, less stress - Increased Occupancy:Hotels saw a 14% boost in occupancy rates, filling more rooms without compromising on price. - Higher Average Daily Rate (ADR):A 4% increase in ADR meant that hotels weren't just filling rooms: they were doing so at better rates. - Time Savings:Automated pricing adjustments freed up valuable time, allowing hoteliers to focus on guest experience rather than manual rate changes. ## Worried about losing control? You’re always in charge You may worry about losing control over pricing or making loyal guests angry with dynamic rates. But with RoomPriceGenie, you always stay in the driver’s seat. Set boundaries, make manual changes anytime, and stay true to your pricing strategy. And for peace of mind? AZHAW School of Management and Law studyshows that dynamic pricing doesn’t hurt guest satisfaction. In fact, with fair, market-driven rates, you’ll likely build even more trust. ## Why chooseRoomPriceGenie? Learn more about how we can help you save time and increase revenue in a way that you will always feel comfortable with. Automation means your prices will adapt to changes in demand and supply much sooner than you could change them yourself. Each week, you save 10 hours of manual work so that you can focus more on what makes your hotel special. RoomPriceGenie has the best-in-class recommendation score on Hotel Tech Report. ## RoomPriceGenie works seamlessly with your existing solution You don’t need a complex setup to run smarthotel revenue management. With 70 integrations and counting—unleash the power of technology by connecting RoomPriceGenie to your PMS or your Channel Manager. Our autopilot integration means your pricing is always kept up-to-date, while you are busy doing other things. ## Trusted by over 4,000hoteliers around the world Mörel, Switzerland ## Markus ## Manager Weymouth, United Kingdom ## Steve ## Hotel owner “I feel much better about pricing, as I can combine both my feelings and experience with the knowledge from RoomPriceGenie, to find the best price. And I always have the option to influence the process.” Salina Maris Spa Hotel in Mörgel, Switzerland Paris, France ## Massiva &Emmanuel ## Hotel owner “I feel much better about pricing, as I can combine both my feelings and experience with the knowledge from RoomPriceGenie, to find the best price. And I always have the option to influence the process.” Salina Maris Spa Hotel in Mörgel, Switzerland ## Meet one of ourrevenue managers Speak to us to learn how we can help you. In a 20-minute call we will discuss: - Your current situation and needs - Our approach to pricing automation - Your individual solution to bring your business to the next level ##
